participant_1.name: Jake Thunder
participant_1.personality: Energetic and passionate about helping others, Jake is a friendly and social individual who thrives in group settings.
participant_1.background: i'm a professional wrestler. i volunteer in a homeless shelter. in my spare time i do volunteer work. i like to workout a times a week. i enjoy being around people.

participant_2.name: Emily Hayes
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and determined, Emily is a thoughtful and introspective person who values her roots and dreams big.
participant_2.background: i want to be a lawyer. my family has raised horses for generations. i'm from a small town. i was raised on a horse farm. i dream of moving to the city.
